Text: Nice one. Love Trower. Would you have Long Misty Days? My vinyl version in bad shape. Thanks.
yeah. I'll put it up shortly. Great album.

It's too bad the sound quality is so poor. I have been experimenting with ways to liven it up and when I get the songs separated I'll uload them here.

I'm using Neve clone inserts , Lexicon reverb, and the BBE Sound Maximizer.
The songs are separated at the web-site listed above. f.y.i.
thank you for all your work!
